latest:
**Critical**: 0-day vulnerability [[6]](https://news.google.?oc=5) [[7]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiVkFVX3lxTE5neVRMZEgzQUNQMUt5NF9LMmo0d19VWlpNVFdLUHlOWlNGdWhqbnpPX2pWQjRoSi1iSWl4STRmZkxkaF85RlhlTXB6b25FMmZ1X19Sc0Vn0gFbQVVfeXFMTlJoX05lRmhTX0lkYk5GcVlidDFhNnV1dFRwVFRpOEl0Yl9vSEI0ZllxU2RPckU2MVVRdkxKQWZTNTBkUkZlbGhGY21VRGU1VzhpT3VNMlFGUlFJSQ?oc=5), Account takeover flaw [[6]](https://news.google.?oc=5) [[7]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiVkFVX3lxTE5neVRMZEgzQUNQMUt5NF9LMmo0d19VWlpNVFdLUHlOWlNGdWhqbnpPX2pWQjRoSi1iSWl4STRmZkxkaF85RlhlTXB6b25FMmZ1X19Sc0Vn0gFbQVVfeXFMTlJoX05lRmhTX0lkYk5GcVlidDFhNnV1dFRwVFRpOEl0Yl9vSEI0ZllxU2RPckU2MVVRdkxKQWZTNTBkUkZlbGhGY21VRGU1VzhpT3VNMlFGUlFJSQ?oc=5)

**Latest**: End User Separation EAP [[2]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9641393017242-Announcing-the-End-User-Separation-EAP-for-department-spaces), trigger redaction [[3]](https://internalnote.com/automated-ticket-redaction/), Release notes [[5]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9637232938138-Release-notes-through-2025-08-22), WhatsApp Flows API

**Meanwhile**: Former HQ to auction [[1]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMixgFBVV95cUxOVmpYSVh6NjRydGVxVDRqSGVfYXlUVHZnMC1Pa0o4V3gwazRwT0FQWGdkbHE0aXJNQkc5dkNKbUtDbFZHOHRYTmpHVFIxcHJfYU01WEhfMmRxQ3c1TV9tRVpGc1dOejkxZk1TMDR6RTRNZ3lDaEI4cTRWUHIweG13NVlvbmtMRm1yQWRzeDAtYV9TZGMza1RKenZfNWQxdERSaEpqM2ZFWmRtTHVNazVTVUpMQmdtWV8ySE5RUjZzdUZUQm5XOWc?oc=5) [[4]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinwFBVV95cUxPYjNpdW1mY3FOMDJnRF9NSVJVNU1yaUNpQklnM0tXcmROdXF1Y1BrR0tkcHVrN0RwWjR2eXFwOXRKQVNLWElHQ1pQWHlKMnpma0xjYTU1OTY2ZC15LUlGVmNqZ056cVE0X0s1aHhEQkZwRDJwS0NkM09mRTE5eFp2d210WUpVQnlpVGhIZzVNTmdrNnBpNDVUaHN6SzRIZUE?oc=5), Steep valuation drop [[1]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMixgFBVV95cUxOVmpYSVh6NjRydGVxVDRqSGVfYXlUVHZnMC1Pa0o4V3gwazRwT0FQWGdkbHE0aXJNQkc5dkNKbUtDbFZHOHRYTmpHVFIxcHJfYU01WEhfMmRxQ3c1TV9tRVpGc1dOejkxZk1TMDR6RTRNZ3lDaEI4cTRWUHIweG13NVlvbmtMRm1yQWRzeDAtYV9TZGMza1RKenZfNWQxdERSaEpqM2ZFWmRtTHVNazVTVUpMQmdtWV8ySE5RUjZzdUZUQm5XOWc?oc=5) [[4]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinwFBVV95cUxPYjNpdW1mY3FOMDJnRF9NSVJVNU1yaUNpQklnM0tXcmROdXF1Y1BrR0tkcHVrN0RwWjR2eXFwOXRKQVNLWElHQ1pQWHlKMnpma0xjYTU1OTY2ZC15LUlGVmNqZ056cVE0X0s1aHhEQkZwRDJwS0NkM09mRTE5eFp2d210WUpVQnlpVGhIZzVNTmdrNnBpNDVUaHN6SzRIZUE?oc=5)
weekly:
**Critical**: 0-day vulnerability [[1]](https://news.google.?oc=5), Multiple pods: adherence issue (Jul 25) [[2]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9627544817434-Announcing-enhanced-dynamic-filtering-for-lookup-relationships), QA assignments stuck (Aug 4) [[3]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9525365886362-Service-Incident-July-25-2025-Multiple-pods-Customers-are-unable-to-use-the-adherence-feature-in-GCP)

**This week**: TTEC partnership [[1]](https://news.google.?oc=5), lookup filtering updates [[2]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9627544817434-Announcing-enhanced-dynamic-filtering-for-lookup-relationships), WhatsApp Flows API [[5]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9623389594010-Announcing-API-support-for-WhatsApp-Flows), import enhancements [[7]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9620124154522-Announcing-import-enhancements-for-the-Exchange-and-Gmail-connectors) 

**Meanwhile**: Zendesk QA migration [[9]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9618795149466-Announcing-the-move-of-Zendesk-QA-user-and-license-management-to-Zendesk-Admin-Center), Sales maintenance (Sep 9) [[8]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9526260605850--Maintenance-Rescheduled-Scheduled-Maintenance-9-September-2025-All-Pods-Zendesk-Sales-Sell-Database-maintenance)
monthly:
**Critical**: QA access issues & 5xx errors (Aug 18) [[1]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9612524497434-Service-Incident-August-18-2025-Zendesk-QA-QA-access-issues-5xx-errors), Meta apps account integration issue (Aug 14) [[8]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9597887995546-Service-Incident-August-14-2025-Multiple-Pods-SunCo-Meta-apps-account-integration-issue), AI Agent delays (Aug 13) [[11]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9594339646362-Service-Incident-August-13-2025-All-pods-AI-Agents-AI-Agent-delays)

**This month**: End User Separation EAP [[1]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9612524497434-Service-Incident-August-18-2025-Zendesk-QA-QA-access-issues-5xx-errors), trigger redaction [[5]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9611518490650-Announcing-a-new-approach-to-email-authentication), OAuth in Admin Center [[7]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9601885707802-Announcing-the-new-external-Oauth-page-in-Admin-Center), WhatsApp Flows API [[5]](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/9611518490650-Announcing-a-new-approach-to-email-authentication) 

**Meanwhile**: Zendesk killer gets funding [[2]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMilwFBVV95cUxOaVJiSzVyRDNkZGJJN05nOUs0U1o3bU5SR2RwMWktd1JLVVpiQkxBbmxob2R1NUFSbXI2SEEyUXZPWjIzaThVOHM0OGFXdTZ3UWxLWEZCRlRSS0thLUN3S0JWOFlNc2ZkcldVZ00ycXJWcWpZM0UtU0d2UlRkYjVFbzI2YXMzRk9FSVV3ZDVoRjBxY1VPQ3h3?oc=5), Zendesk boosts efficiency with GPT-5 [[13]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMimAFBVV95cUxPT3d4aENIQ05DVmttSmk3NXFmYk05azQzdUt3WGxUNnlWOFBLaXFIV3ZLWjFSTjhfaWl3bG13cHFQV25JTWhZNkRSblNfMjJSRzFIQjZGVnlNZWZDYUszVzVLeUIxZ3VjWDMwMlVOa013d3ZNSl9fWXlHVUs5blB1bkgtSzh3QlJFSEtGZkNDanJxY2RRcmlDQg?oc=5), Zendesk expands for AI demand [[14]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMihAFBVV95cUxQUDhKNmJCYVdqRlpmWHVRcEFSdWozY1JIb1dqOTJ0dDJtNG9VbHI2dl9rS3lwOXh4OENOdDQtWERjUjRGTW1wbXJOMXNqX3dJSFdCTkJINEVyVWtiaE96NWYydm5IUWp3ZUZIZGJrOEpGejRSbzRBWTVKLU5PdmhYeTZKWEs?oc=5), Zendesk adopts outcome-pricing [[19]](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiogFBVV95cUxNb3FSNnpURW1rYjM0VHpSSmp3VDFSLWVESlJUajRmcnozVEticUM3WGdUM1pfY25WelRSOXgyNnN5Vm9Qb0ZHalJydGZDVlhLOWstNl9YVC1RQVVFYkk1N05oVVFrZGE4dWpYQzBPeHJrbDVsSEhwbVpPSS16MG9WTGI4TmxKSGZmMjQwNDlsSVR1RGJ5aWpoeU1JV1JSYmNLN1E?oc=5)

release_notes.summary: Copilot: auto assist can now suggest existing macros to agents. AI Agents Advanced: improved dialogue builder UI for hiding/disabling parameter branches.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-08-22
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
AI Agents Advanced
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
